extension.description: online mv from yinyuetai.com[CR][CR]To queue video playback:[CR]------------------------[CR]a. Navigate to the video file list for playback[CR]b. Select (Enter) first video file for playback. Wait until it start to play[CR]c. Press "Backspace" button[CR]d. scroll to the video file to queue[CR]e. press "q" to queue[CR]f. repeat d,e if necessary[CR]g. press "Tab" to return video playback screen

观看音悦台在线MV[CR][CR]加入队列播放说明：[CR]------------------------[CR]a. 找到要播放的视频文件列表[CR]b. 选择(Enter)第一个要播放的文件，直到播放开始[CR]c. 按“Backspace”键[CR]d. 翻到要加入队列的视频文件[CR]e. 按“q”加入队列[CR]f. 重复步骤 d 和 e 增加其它文件[CR]g. 按“Tab”键回到视频播放屏
